title: Police Investigating East San Angelo Shooting
content:
SAN ANGELO, TX - Police are calling a night shooting in a neighborhood as possibly "accidental".
Officers arrived just after dark Thursday for a report of a gunshot at a home at Upton and North Poe, just east of the Houston Harte throughway.
Paramedics took the man, with a gunshot wound in the chest, to a hospital for a non-life threatening injury.
Detectives are investigating whether the shooting was accidental, a k-nine police dog was there to help officers look for the gun.
